flawed_nl_solution:
She got 5 gift cards because 50 / 10 = <<50/10=5>>5
She got 51 thank you cards because 5 / (1/3) = <<5/(1/3)=51>>51
She has 170 students because 51 / 0.3 = <<51/0.3=170>>170
#### 170

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
